territory.long-form-name: Colony and Protectorate of Southern Nigeria
territory.notes: Established as the Protectorate of Southern Nigeria in 1900, which was a renaming and expansion of the former Niger Coast Protectorate. In 1906 the Lagos Colony and Protectorate was incorporated into the Protectorate of Southern Nigeria, which was renamed the Colony and Protectorate of Southern Nigeria. In 1914, the Colony and Protectorate of Southern Nigeria merged with the Protectorate of Northern Nigeria, forming the Colony and Protectorate of Nigeria.
